channel.title: Blog on Graham Brown
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Graham Brown

item.title: Is My Alarm Panel Smart?
item.description: In this modern world with the Internet everything has become smart.

item.title: Business Continuity in the COVID-19 pandemic
item.description: COVID-19 has forced many businesses to act on their continuity plans. Fortunately, as we operate mostly online we were able to execute a plan with relative ease.

item.title: UPS Monitoring
item.description: In order to run any computer you need power - so without power your computer is rendered useless, and that effectively renders a modern business dead too.

item.title: Asterisk Africa Community Conference 2018
item.description: I got to present at and attend the Asterisk Africa Community Conference 2018.

item.title: Hacktoberfest (Open source contribution)
item.description: Most businesses use Open Source Software in some way, whether it’s bundled in a product they purchased or using it directly, however not many give back to those projects…

item.title: Building a website with Hugo
item.description: When it comes to hosting a website there are many options - from using a database with a programming language that generates pages to hand editing pages or somewhere in-between.
